Solution from editorial for problem C:

   #include <bits/stdc++.h>
   using namespace std;

   void solve() {
     int n; cin >> n;
     vector<int> v(n); 
     for (auto &x : v) cin >> x;
     int64_t total = accumulate(v.begin(), v.end(), 0LL);
     int64_t min_prefix = 0;
     int64_t cur_prefix = 0;
     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        cur_prefix += v[i];
        min_prefix = min(min_prefix, cur_prefix);
     }
     int64_t start = -min_prefix;
     cur_prefix = start;
     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
